My mom died on September 5, 2019 and I need this.

title: Great app for making changes, but also has surprise
review:
I love this app so far, it truly helps me to keep on the schedule from drinking water to exercise.
However, when I switch my phone from Apple to Samsung, I can no longer sign back in and the app keeps on asking me for money - not mentioning all my past data were all gone. Even when I use my iPad to log on, it still will not recognize my information and ask for money again. 
This app has very good concept in habit psychology, but still needs a lot to improve in its technical part.

title: BEAUTIFUL get it
review: ‚ú®I recently got this app because I was stressed and overwhelmed with school. I had some goals that I just let go of because I wasn‚Äôt motivated. The animation and all the little things this app encourages you to do is so helpful. I LOVE THIS. Yes u can pay for better stuff but this has SOOO much available to u without paying. It‚Äôs like you aren‚Äôt missing out on anything. This is a true friend ‚ú®‚ú®‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è

title: I ‚ù§Ô∏è This App
review: This app is great in so many ways especially for people who struggle with depression or general unmotivation to complete tasks and feel energized. A down side is that it costs money to use which I think it should be free and maybe just include Ads within the app. Im on my free trial now but even though i love it so much im not sure i will continue to use just because of the money.

title: beautiful
review: This has been my 4-5 day using this app and I personally love it so much. It has been helping me so far and I‚Äôm beyond happy I found it. It reminds me to appreciate and celebrate the small changes I‚Äôm making. It also cheers me up which I love and it‚Äôs rare for apps to do that. I recommend this app, it‚Äôs like you have friend that‚Äôs always supporting you and pushing you to do better.

title: Charge you even if you cancel and don‚Äôt do refunds
review: I signed up for the trial and realized it was not useful to me so I cancelled on day 2 or 3.  They still charged me.  I emailed them and get an auto reply telling me how to cancel and to reply to the email if o need more help. I reply to the email and get the same auto reply over and over.  I emailed their help address - and get the auto reply.  I tried filling out the form and got a message saying they don‚Äôt do refunds at all. My account no longer exists - I tried logging in and a password reset to contact them that way  but o have no account AND THEY STILL CHARGED ME.  Complete rip-off.

title: One-of-a-Kind Program
review: This program is like venturing into the world of the self. Not only are the practices amazing and helpful, but they present it in a way that‚Äôs EXCITING to implement . Complete with a wonderful story told through  powerful poetry. I cannot wait to open the app each day and further add more of their practices to improve my daily life. It‚Äôs marked progress I can see and feel and I love it.

title: Very cool app - quite different from others yet quite intriguing in its own way
review: I like this app. It brings fun to making your life better. The stories are interesting and you can add different habits at your own pace. I‚Äôve seen nothing like it and I‚Äôm just a starter so I'm learning as I go. Keep up the good work and let‚Äôs make developing positive habits a fun endeavor. Something you guys have done so thanks!

title: Bad at routines
review: I‚Äôve been trying to nail down a morning routine for years now and always start one but 2-3 days later, I stop. I fall back into old habits pretty quickly. With this app taking things one step at a time and not everything at once, I am finding it‚Äôs easier to stick to! Definitely recommend for anyone needing that balance in their life!

title: Beautiful
review: I have been working on building a better and more productive lifestyle, as I‚Äôm sure you know, it‚Äôs tough. Having something to look forward to while building new habits reinforces my wanting to come back to it every day. This app is beautifully made with the intention of helping people better themselves. It‚Äôs the perfect addition to building a better me. Thank you!

title: Great app for those that need daily nudges
review: I have been using and getting to know how to use all the things this app can do.  For me, it‚Äôs like a daily to-do list mixed with a coach and music and much more.  And it tracks your progress for learning knew habits.  As well as when you start to try to add too much at once, it reminds you why you should go slow.  I love it.   A lot.

title: Best App ever
review: I‚Äôm literally excited to wake up and use this app. It is super user friendly. It actually helps build habits in a manageable way. It‚Äôs exciting to build habits and NOT overwhelming. The in program meditations and stories are amazing as well. I‚Äôve never seen any app like this. I‚Äôve never written a review on an app before this one. I shared this with a lot of my friends. Definitely recommend this!

title: Confusing and non-intuitive
review: A horribly confusing, non-intuitive interface with no information regarding details of any journey or habit choice. Useless, unless your goal is to blindly follow a random plan without understanding how it connects to your personal goals. It was a pretty interface, but that‚Äôs it. Impossible to figure out what I was doing and why. I had goals that I wanted to pursue, but upon opening the app and initiating, suddenly I‚Äôm signed up for ‚Äúdrinking water‚Äù (?!) and can‚Äôt find how to add and focus on what I want. If I can‚Äôt easily determine how it works, there‚Äôs no way I‚Äôm agreeing to the ridiculous $36 price. Disappointing.

title: Love this!
review: Even though you do have to pay, I think it‚Äôs worth it! This little app has a ton of useful information and acts like an accountability partner. I don‚Äôt want to let Fabulous down, so I make sure to complete all my steps. With this app so far, I‚Äôve started drinking water every morning, eating breakfast and exercising! Plus, I get a motivational chat to perk me up. It‚Äôs awesome! Definitely recommend.

title: Good
review: I really enjoy this app. I love how it motivates me to do better and makes me feel more organized in my every day life. However some of the things I wish I could do I can‚Äôt because I don‚Äôt have the upgraded version. I am only a teenager and I don‚Äôt have a job to make money that I can spend on this app. I really wish I did because the upgraded version looks sweet.... only if I really knew how it was. Anyway I really recommend this app.

title: Great way to start my day
review: If you have trouble remaining consistent even when you can't see results right away, this app is for you. This app makes having a routine more organized, simpler, and definitely more fun. A routine should not be something that you dread every day but something that gets you ahead and gives you peace for the rest of the day

title: So much potential‚ÄîI want the app to be great
review: I‚Äôve been using the app for a week, and tomorrow I‚Äôll be required to pay for the premium access that I‚Äôve been receiving free for 7 days. From what I saw initially, the app is worth it, but after the second day, the notifications stopped pushing to my phone and there has been bugs that just doesn‚Äôt live up to my high hopes. I‚Äôm nervous about spending money on an app that will leave me with much to be desired despite its potential.

title: Small Steps Go A Long Way
review: For my New Years Resolution, I wanted to start good habits and get rid of bad ones. I wasn‚Äôt sure where to start but this app has helped me with my beginning steps. Little by little I‚Äôve been taking small actions to help me feel more productive in my day to day life. I would definitely recommend this to anyone who is looking for the same thing!

title: First time
review: So I just started Fabulous about a week ago. I can say that it‚Äôs alright. I still have to play with it to figure things out. I do wish that there were ‚Äúalarms‚Äù as reminders and a ‚Äúsnooze‚Äù so that if you are, let‚Äôs say running behind, you can have the reminders to remind you of your goal(s) that you need to accomplish. Again, I just downloaded it so I still have to play with the app. But so far, I think it‚Äôs great.

title: Helpful
review: I‚Äôve always had a hard time identifying and setting goals for myself. This app has gentle reminders abs doesn‚Äôt make you feel bad on sometimes a bumpy road to success. Lovely graphics and encouraging words have also been helpful for me as a visual learner. I only have it 4 stars because it is a little hard to negotiate as there is a lot here abs I feel like I need more guidance with more frequent  pop ups to guide me.

title: No choice over goals
review: I downloaded this, and although it let me choose in theory what I was interested in, the first goal it chose for me was drinking 8 glasses of water a day. This arbitrary amount has been repeatedly debunked by doctors and is actually *not* good for some people. When I tried to get rid of that as a goal, it kept jumping to screens that talked about the importance of water (so much for choosing your own goals), then it went to a screen that showed a mountain with a pre-set path as if this were a game aimed at 10 year olds. Too frustrating to deal with; I quickly deleted.

title: Such a great app
review: I‚Äôve only been using it for a week and wow has it made me changeüòÇ in a good way and it starts you off small and works you up to bigger and better things. It helps keep track of your water intake and food you eat to make sure you have a balanced day.. and the best part this is all without having to pay for the premium.

review: This app is great in regards to providing useful reading material, tracking habits, exploring philosophy, and trying new things. I would have no complaints except for the fact the female voice used for everything is awful. It is extremely aggravating to try and meditate while listening to someone pronouncing her T‚Äôs like she‚Äôs auditioning for an ASMR channel. Please provide more voice options, ideally someone who will speak normally.

title: Love it!
review: I don‚Äôt usually write reviews but I feel like I need too! I‚Äôve been using the free version and it has been so easy! I‚Äôm on my first journey and I already added one more habit to that plan! I am even considering buying the premium subscription because I like this app way more than other apps I‚Äôve tried. And it‚Äôs super cheap compared to the apps I paid for previously!

title: I like the idea..
review: I love habit tracker apps and the idea of them. This one seems great and I like it so far but my main complaint is that the app is SOO confusing to use. There are so many features it‚Äôs overwhelming to me. Half the time I can‚Äôt even figure out how to get to my morning routine. I would live it was easier to navigate. It seems like it‚Äôs designed for someone who has already been using it for months, not for a new user. Other than that I live the graphics, Info , and sounds.

title: ED Recovery beware
review: I chose the option that I am happy with my health and fitness but was still shown ‚Äúintermittent fasting‚Äù and ‚Äúthrow out all the junk food‚Äù as my future goals?? Really disappointed because this has potential but it‚Äôs harmful to assume everyone needs dieting or food based goals. Many people suffer from eating disorders, knowingly or not, and will starve themselves or binge eat because of insidious messages like these. I think changing diet and exercise habits are great for some! But why does it need to be everyone‚Äôs goal? Especially when the user specifies they are already happy with their fitness?

title: Makes dreams into reality
review:
This app helped me to slowly pick myself up out of a stubborn depression spell.
I couldn‚Äôt be motivated to do anything.. and that made me feel sick, and ashamed.
The fabulous app started out by encouraging me to drink water every morning when I woke up. That was so simple, and easy, I couldn‚Äôt say no. It felt good to track my progress and unlock encouraging, and inspiring videos.
Eventually my morning routine also included exercising, and cleaning my room for 5 minutes. This has given me so much energy! I feel productive, excited, and like anything is possible! 
I can eat an ENTIRE ELEPHANT! It happens one bite at a time. 

Thank you, Fabulous app, for giving a new zeal for life, and the confidence to chase my dreams!

title: literally life changing app
review: ever since i started using fabulous i‚Äôve been my best self, physically, mentally, and emotionally. i used to have problems with my OCD, and i would have panic attacks because i wasn‚Äôt keeping up with my strict schedule. but everything fabulous gives me is fit to my schedule, and it‚Äôs realistic and doable. so if you get stressed like me, just take a breath, and press that blue button;)

title: Who knew reforming habits was so simple??
review: I love this app. It is incredible simple, easy to use, very user friendly, and backed by science. I love how it started me with one simple goal and gradually increased tasks, while all the while providing evidence from case studies to encourage me that what I‚Äôm doing really does have impact. I have already noticed a change in my energy and motivation that lasts from morning to evening!

title: Love it so far
review: The dynamic storytelling makes it feel like a game that I'm the main character in, it's a nice incentive to keep going as opposed to less guidance and making me work everything out at once. I like the slow and steady wins the race. I love all the daily story videos and guidance. I think this is the best app I've downloaded and I'm only on day 3. I'll update my review as time passes!

title: A worthy investment
review: Want an app that helps you to pay attention to the little details in life that make a big difference in how you experience your day? This app does that. The features focus on areas that you would not think to consider like thought-provoking coaching segments and writing reflections for various activities. It‚Äôs a wonderful way to learn self-care.

title: Best app ever!
review:
Seriously this app is incredible. I am just scratching the surface and feel powerful just after the fourth day of using it. I was struggling with anxiety and this has brought me calmness and purpose. I love the daily coaching as it gets me to ponder life‚Äôs nuances before I start my day. Before this app, I would ponder my stresses instead!

Download this app if you need some clarity...you won‚Äôt regret it!

title: I recommend
review: I truly enjoy this app. Even when I forget to use it. I go back to it. The Daily Coaching feature is my favorite. It‚Äôs a couple of words that allows a broader perspective on a variety of goals. Put in effort to achieve your goals and let Fabulous help you when it gets tough. It‚Äôs a place of reflection and kindness. I love it <3 Thanks to the creator(s) for dedicating a program.

title: Love it!
review: So far I have just been using what is available for free, but based on the experience so far I do plan on purchasing the premium. It has been so helpful, has so many tools available to build successful habits, and has great graphics! You even go through a story along the way of building your habits so it is entertaining to start something new.

title: LOVE!
review: This app has helped me tremendously! 2020 had me in such a funk and I never in a million years could have imagined that an app would help me out of said funk, but IT DID! Instead of getting overwhelmed by the million changes I needed to make, Fabulous helped remind me that change is gradual. One thing at a time. I highly recommend the premium version of this app. Although the free one is good too!

title: Surprisingly Different and Helpful
review:
I have tried multiple apps and multiple ways to begin a new practice or to begin again.  This far this app is helpful in a way that I don‚Äôt get ahead of myself in trying to implement too many things at once, only to fail.  
I have found it to be precisely what I need for where I am at in my life.  Slow and steady.

title: Great tool
review: This app has been wonderful for creating and sticking with healthy habits, and starting small and building foundations. In the past I have put too many things on my plate to change in my life. It always ended in me crashing and burning out before I could create new habits. This helps me slow down and build small realistic goals and meet them.

title: Hi :)
review: I have been using this app for about a week and I‚Äôve already been able to keep up with my schedule and I‚Äôve been able to make myself wake up at a decent hour and the app has just been doing a lot for me already and I just got it! Though I am using the free trial for premium and I‚Äôm worried about what will change when that runs out.

title: Love the app
review: Loveeee this app 100%!!!! Only wish I could pay monthly and not yearly as it seems to keep me motivated to keep using it with those reminders to renew my purchases but I love the graphics so much they are beautiful I wish there were more not because there‚Äôs not enough but becauSe I just can‚Äôt get enough of all the beautiful art! It makes doing habits fun and inspiring

title: BEWARE!! App will sign you up for premium without asking!!!
review:
This app will automatically sign you up for premium without asking permission! One day near the end of the trial you will wake up with it saying Congrats & welcome to Premium! 

I was just trying out this app & was liking it a little, but had no idea it would automatically sign me up for a year of premium without asking!! Developers-I am seeing other people writing the same thing & I feel this is a super shady way to get $ for your app! Tricking people into buying it hasn‚Äôt made me love this, it‚Äôs done the opposite! 
This is NOT COOL! How do I get a refund?

review: I found this app while I was looking for something to help with stress and anxiety. It allows you to customize goals and breaks them apart into very small steps. There are infographics, daily reminders and encouragement, a storyline for your journey, anecdotes around the psychology of it all. It‚Äôs really helping me to slow down and center. I‚Äôm motivated to see through on my goals.

title: So helpful!
review: In my first day I was already loving the features of the app. So much is covered from the beginning of your day to the end of it. And there's a bunch of options for new habits and scheduling, along with deep thought provoking lessons and stories. Personally, it keeps me mindful of my time and consistent with new habits. I'm so glad I found this app, and I'm definitely recommending it. ‚ô•Ô∏è

title: Great app but glitchy at times
review: Great app when it works. It often logs me out and I need to log in to get the premium features back. I couldn‚Äôt restore my purchase of the subscription. The app wouldn‚Äôt let me log in using my email address so I had to delete the app in order to finally log in and restore to premium. Now it‚Äôs saying it could take 10 min to restore my progress. Disappointing. If they used in-app purchases properly this wouldn‚Äôt be an issue.

title: Great app
review:
Update: Yesterday my Fab app stopped launching my daily routines, just the list of habits show up and not the individual habit screens. It‚Äôs quite frustrating!! Please fix this...

So far so good. I like the daily prompts though sometimes it‚Äôs confusing to know where to tap/go and what to do. But I like that it forces me to reflect and practice good habits.

I really miss the launching of my daily routines!! I‚Äôve already re-downloaded, reset, and started my journeys all over again to no avail‚Äîwhat gives?

title: IT WORKS IF YOU WORK
review: So far so good. At first it only allowed me the water drinking habit, which almost made me not use the app. STAY WITH IT! After they see you are actually doing your habits, after about two days everything unlocked and I can make my routines how I want! I also like how interactive the app is because it definitely make me want to actually incorporate it into my day.

title: Dark UX practices
review:
Another "self-care" app that starts you off with a short free trial and quietly charges you a huge expensive annual membership fee before you even remember you installed it. 

It‚Äôs 2021. We know that financial hardship is one of the biggest factors that can possibly go into your mental and physical health. Doesn‚Äôt matter how good the app may be, it probably does more harm than good for most people who install it because of this predatory sales tactic.

If they really cared about the well-being of their customers, they wouldn‚Äôt do this. So that probably hints to the quality of whatever help it purports to provide.

I‚Äôm not feeling overwhelmed, and enjoying every minute of it. It truly helps if you are willing to take the steps. Very soothing, the design and animations are absolutely gorgeous.

title: Starting to Feel Fabulous Again

title: Be aware
review:
Be very aware of the limit of the free trial. Miss the deadline by even a minute and they will happily take your money and hang onto it. Of course they are within their rights, but many companies are willing to work with people in good faith if you address it quickly. Not so eh this company. They will send you perky emails telling you how to store your subscription while closing over your request for a refund. They don‚Äôt do refunds, of course. The process is the process, and they will make sure you know it. Again - they have the right to operate this way. 
Just be mindful this is who you are dealing with.

review:
So far, I have developed three habits in one week, and it's a lot for someone who is struggling to keep habits.

review: The fabulous keeps me on track of taking care of me! I wanted to focus on a becoming a better person starting with taking care of myself both mind and body. I started with a free week trial and absolutely loved it!! From drinking water to exercise, setting goals and meditation.  This app keeps makes it easy to stay on track and I feel fabulous!!

title: Love!
review: I suffer from not holding myself accountable and sticking to a routine no matter how hard I try. But this app has really helped me prioritize my goals and tasks. I was never one to meditate or do yoga, but their meditation exercises are actually really neat, and they make me feel good after going through them. Definitely worth a try if you‚Äôd like some consistency in your day-to-day.

title: Fabulous is truly an adventure! üßôüèæ‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏èüåªü¶ã
review: This app was created and built by very creative people who care. I‚Äôm loving it so far. The amount of resources and tools you can use to change your life seem endless. Much lo to you Fabulous!üíñ

title: Just a few days in POV

title: Really loving this app!
review:
I downloaded this app about a week ago, and I‚Äôm really loving it!! I love that the app does kind of a step by step with you, for me personally it really helps since I have a hard time doing things by myself. 

I also always look forward to the story that comes along with your ‚Äúchallenge journey‚Äù it‚Äôs such a unique addition that I turned out loving! 

And I really appreciate that it has you start with little steps and start to progress after a little while instead of coming all at you at once!

title: Freaking fabulous
review: This app is not only practical and helpful, it‚Äôs actually super entertaining. title: Its great... want to share but...
review:
The app is great it‚Äôs so helpful in developing healthy habits and a daily routine.   I‚Äôve been using it for a month and it keeps me accountable minus the guilty feeling though.  

The one thing that stops me from giving it a Five stars is that when I try to share the free passes I have earned, it requires pay information from my family and friends.  That part turns them off and makes them not want to try it. 

It‚Äôs totally understandable why someone doesn‚Äôt want to share their credit card information right away.   I feel like there should be a way to bypass this option.  It would definitely give others an opportunity to see the value of this app.  

Other than that, I love it.

title: Amazing app
review:
I love this app so much
Especially the 7 minute work out
I am a pre teen and I used to live in Nigeria 
I was really skinny back then and when we move to America, after a year I started to gain a lot of weight. I am fine with my body it is just that my stomach gotta a little big. Fabulous has helped me a lot. Because the workout mostly focuses on your stomach.

The only thing I‚Äôm not keen on is all the alerts it dings to get you to pick up your phone. Other than that, a delightful and fun way to develop new and shiny habits! üåü

title: Surprised

This app breaks everything down in baby steps and was a great way of pushing you to get those done and I love that I‚Äôve only had it a few days but I genuinely like it.

However, there aren‚Äôt enough Daily Stoic‚Äôs so I‚Äôve heard each of them a handful of times. I‚Äôm hopeful Fabulous will start creating new content so the same content isn‚Äôt repeated so much. title: Motivation to form good habits
review: This app has helped me to remain focused on taking care of myself, so I can take care other others. Routine is important, this app helps to form habits as well as making sure that you don‚Äôt stuck in a rut by doing the same thing over and over. It helps to get you out of your comfort zone without being overwhelming or cheesy.

Now, I am being refused a refund. Worse app purchase to date.

title: Amazing app for young and old combined
review: This app is great even for those who usually can‚Äôt pay for mental health apps. It really does help you set goals and reminds you. review:
I like the app itself. I think that it‚Äôs cute with all the little motivational quotes and stories. I think it‚Äôs nice that it has that little something extra & is very organized. (Organization is something I definitely need in my life!)

However, I signed up for the free week trial & was planning on doing the $3 a month payment plan if I liked it, but it looks like it‚Äôs only giving me the option to pay the full year price, which isn‚Äôt what I wanted to do.

title: Love
review: Love this app. It‚Äôs so helpful when it comes to motivation, support and all around positivity. The goals are reasonable, because YOU choose them yourself; and if you mess up? I love this app. It‚Äôs like a little life coach you can go to at any point to get great advice and fresh perspective to start a positive journey for your life.

title: This. This is the one!

title: Like it so far, feels promising

I‚Äôve only been using this for 8 days but I see very large potential in this app compared to other self help apps. This doesn‚Äôt rush you, and won‚Äôt allow you to rush yourself and get burnt out. It‚Äôs all about slow change which is how real personal change happens.

title: I LOVE THIS APP! IT HELPED ME SO MUCH

It also is based on what you want or your needs are. I challenge you to open this app and start your journey like I did!

title: One of my favorite apps I‚Äôve ever downloaded

It‚Äôs like my little delight to myself that I get to engage in every day. It‚Äôs designed like a journey and builds on itself as your grow. title: Not very far along

review:

title: I love this app

It appears that it‚Äôs wizard driven and so when it‚Äôs time to add new goals and habits it just takes you where you need to go. It‚Äôs calming. And I can relax for the 5 mins.

Only reason I didn‚Äôt give 5 stars is cause the user interface is a little too much for me, just too much going on sometimes, but I‚Äôm sure it‚Äôs just perfect for others. Would recommend for anyone who has the will and discipline to create better habits.

title: So far so good

It doesn‚Äôt go ‚ÄúDo this, and do that, and do that over there, and do this.....‚Äù.  It takes everything one step at a time. I‚Äôll revisit this review after a month.  I love it!

title: Fabulous

I didn‚Äôt even have to pay like it said in the beginning it scared me at first but if you just x it out you can go on without paying. I am hoping I will become a better me.

title: Love this app

I love the fact there‚Äôs additional life challenges where you can have accountability partners and the helpful images! I‚Äôm feeling positive changes coming my way!!!

title: Amaaaaazing!

Also it helps for boosting your energy level, or whatever you need, it is absolutely amazing and this helps me soo much!

title: Cute app and helps keep me accountable!

title: Pleasantly Effective

Been using this for a week and I‚Äôve already incorporated things that I‚Äôve been wanting to do regularly (for years) into my life. Curious as to the long terms effects but so far, I‚Äôm loving it!

title: Excited to set and achieve goals üí™
review: They definitely know how to create a great user experience, from their illustrations, goal options/availability, keeping the user accountable, timed reminders, and digestible daily articles‚Äîneed I say more‚ÄîI‚Äôm surprised how effective this app is! Even completing small tasks keeps me motivated. I‚Äôm excited to challenge myself more with this app!

title: Just like mom and dad
review: I feel so much lighter and more productive. No matter how old you get everyone likes the feeling of a parents love and care. This app allows you to set reminders to do things like take vitamins, drink water, they even give you advice on hard topics ... just like mom and dad! Totally recommend this app. If you‚Äôre CONSISTENT you‚Äôll see results

title: Amazing and Life changing
review: This app has really helped me be more positive and confident in myself.  In completing tasks and doing things that benefit myself I often feel less stress and anxiety. Instead I‚Äôm finding myself being more positive, relaxed, and grateful. This app has helped me Orginize my thoughts and brought me peace of mind.  Would highly recommend it.  Entirely worth it!

title: What is going on with this app
review: This app was awesome. I have ADD and so far it is was helping me overcome a lot of challenges. Unfortunately the app has started not working properly. First I was charged for two supscriptions. I messaged support and it took over a week for them to respond. The response was garbage, like they did not even read it. The second issue was that the daily coaching just stopped. They said there was an issue for some devices and it was being worked on. They gave me some directions on what to do and that did not correct the issue.

title: Kinda liked it at first, but...
review: ...it sorta just became annoying. I started to dread the sounds of the uniquely incessantly happy tone in the morning, the cheesily overly-optimistic feel of the stories, and the game-like, journey-esque framing of the fabulous worldview on life that just felt fake to me. Couldn't get into it. Maybe it's based on a soft-sci psychology, maybe it just isn't my sauce. If it works for you, great. But if you're a bit of a glass is both half full and half empty at the same time kinda guy like me, you might want something different.

title: Best habit tracker I've found
review:
Been through a lot of habit trackers. This one is great because it starts small and builds over time. It has a lot of custom options as well as per programmed options. Fantastic app, I strongly recommend. My only critique is that it's just a little too froofy With all the "fabulous" and excessive flowery praise.

Overall a great download

title: Focus!
review: A few months ago I quit my stressful full time job to focus on healing my mental health and creating art, instead I found myself confronting an emotional buildup and a creative block. I‚Äôve only been using this wonderful app for a week and it already seems to be the lift I need to break the wall and start making progress !

title: It is a Fabulous app after all
review: It‚Äôs been helping me create healthy habits, it feels like someone it‚Äôs watching over me. I love everything from the UI to the sound effects. The challenges are a motivating way to also engage you on healthy habits. Highly recommend to those that have not yet found and practiced their morning and evening routine!

title: So helpful
review: During this time of uncertainty and not a lot of structure in my day to day life it has helped tremendously! I thoroughly enjoy having little task that are achievable and maintainable to complete during the day. It gives me a sense of accomplishment. I plan on continuing the journey even after quarantine and the pandemic. This has been a positive change in my life.

And then it teaches you how how to make those habits, and how to sustain them. This app is teaching me to love and take of myself in ways I never really thought of before. I can‚Äôt wait to take on my next challenge!

title: great at first, now i can‚Äôt do anything...
review:
when i first got this app, it was amazing. it helped me to develop a ton of new habits. after a bit i stopped using it. wanting to use it again, i recently updated it and went to edit my routines- what i found was that i apparently had to pay to add or remove any actions that i had. 
i wish from the bottom of my heart that this didn‚Äôt happen. it‚Äôs absolutely ridiculous. it was so amazing, and helped me so much, but now i have to pay to get the same things that i had before with the standard plan. i‚Äôm absolutely furious right now. maybe it‚Äôs a complication or something, but if you started with the routines being free, you should keep them like that, since those are the most helpful things on this app.

title: Show me your habits!
review: No matter what we all have habits. Some are good and some are bad. However this app help you establish good habits which eventually will erase in overwrite bad habits. It helps you get a start on your day and in your day on a good note. You can‚Äôt help but manifest and attract abundance when you‚Äôre starting and ending your day and a fabulous way!

title: Really amazing app.

I was looking for an app that would help me accomplish my personal goals and found this app which is totally different but it's still worth it!

The only negative that I have is that they don't offer a monthly subscription, you have to get the yearly subscription but again it seems worth it.

title: So Far So Good
review: I‚Äôm really enjoying this app. It‚Äôs helping me set and accomplish goals. It help keeps me focused on the work, rather than the problems, if that makes sense. It‚Äôs very positive. It‚Äôs been a little confusing for me to know what I‚Äôm ‚Äúsupposed‚Äù to do, and I docked a star for that. I‚Äôm feeling more confident as time goes on, and I‚Äôve found detailed info about what‚Äôs all there, anyway. I‚Äôm glad I bought it.

title: I feel so productive!
review: I have only had this app on my phone for a week, but I have completed my routine 4 days this week already and I feel so much better about myself! I love this app because of all of the positive reinforcement and encouragement and the fun infographics. The messages are sometimes a little hokey, but it‚Äôs also fun!

title: Made a difference in my life
review:
This app has really high quality content and beautiful sounds that are captivating. So many apps similar to this end up being a nuisance and quite annoying. I find that I always feel more mindful, especially after listening to some of their guided audio‚Äôs. 

Really great app.

title: Loving this app so far!
review: I love the motivation, the reminders, the stories, the future self letters. I‚Äôve been taking much better care of myself in just the week that I‚Äôve had the app. For those who like to check mark off their to do list and are interested in better habits, I highly recommend this app!

title: My one to go app !
review: Love this app. Its a mix of setting yourself reminders, in the most kind and inspiring way, self care and inspiration for goal setting. review: This is the app if you want to keep track and maintain a healthy life. It always has me getting to new habits that I usually wouldn‚Äôt do also reminds you to keep track of your stuff with the notifications. Overall GREATEST APP

title: The Best Thing Ever!!!!
review: I‚Äôm not proud of my body even as a young teen but this helps so so much, I would highly recommend getting it. It is so inspirational and so simple to use, it feels like an actual friend suggesting you things though it is just AI. I hope you will try it out and to the developers of the app, thank you so much and Happy New Year!!!!!

title: Enjoying it so far ‚ò∫Ô∏è
review: Had to check this app out after I saw it was created through the Duke university behavioral Econ dept, seems pretty well designed, UI feels a little messy but I kinda like that actually, only been using it for a couple weeks so far though so we‚Äôll see how it goes.

title: Adore this app!
review: This app has brought me joy in many ways. It‚Äôs help me with consistency and holding myself accountable. I love the design esthetic! It‚Äôs ethereal, whimsical and playful. From the music, to the poetic words, and even the color palette- I love it all! What I appreciate the most is the ‚Äúfuture self‚Äù letter and words of encouragement it gives you throughout your journey. Thank you for this!

title: No other app like it
review: Finally got the premium membership.I only wish I would‚Äôve gotten it sooner I had this app when it was first released and it helped me lose 20 pounds and get back on track after having a baby. I feel more focused, determined and content with myself as I‚Äôve been using it.

title: Wow! Life changing & uplifting through tiny shifts
review: Absolutely love this app, it truly is fabulous. It integrates creating new habits, with coaching to improve both physical and mental wellbeing while at the same time being guided with a supportive voice coach and calming music. It‚Äôs not one thing, It‚Äôs a number of things integrated into one to improve yourself in different areas. Love it.

title: Great for reaching goals

I give 4 stars because I wish the afternoon goals could be broken up. I wAnt to move some of them to different times but I can‚Äôt figure our how to or maybe it‚Äôs not possible. Overall I do like this app & have seen positive change.

title: My personal life coach

Fabulous is like having a personal coach. Like a human coach, sometimes you just want it to leave you the heck alone üòâ, but since I‚Äôm developing some new habits, it really does help me keep on track (and no guilt trips!)
If you want to improve your overall health and well-being, both physically and mentally- this is the app for you.

review: Great app. However, I have contacted customer service multiple times regarding The problem with no alarms. I have adjusted off the notifications but the alarms still do not go through and it is almost impossible to remember the reminders and daily tasks without an alarm. title: Consistently helpful
review: I have used Fabulous a few times since it began, and although I often get derailed by life, I always find myself coming back to recenter myself on healthy habits. title: Amazing life changing experience!!!
review:
I‚Äôm so impressed with everything that this app has to offer. I‚Äôm a path of self discovery and was looking for a life couching. It turns out that this app does it all plus much more! 
Thank you amazing creators. It takes creativity and a lot of sensibility to design this app plus lots of research. I feel at home with this app.

title: Great way to start your day

review: This app is a fun and gentle reminder to do all the small things we know we should be doing. You get to pick your journeys and personalized routines to best improve your life. review:
The app is very confusing.  A lot of extra fluff for those that just want to stick to the goals at hand. I found the navigation to be confusing.

Also,  I had remembered to cancel my subscription before the end of the trial period and the app still charged me.  I then went through the process to get reimbursed only to find a canned response that they would not be able to reimburse me and blames Apple because of it.

I lost 35 bucks.  But worth it to learn a lesson,  I‚Äôll be more careful next time and cannot recommend this app.

title: Great content, really free

title: Pop ups Galore
review:
I never write reviews. Partly because I find that people only write 1 or 5 star reviews but also because I‚Äôm a developer myself.

I am only writing this to hopefully reach the Fabulous team. I was really excited about joining Fabulous and the intro to the app was really great. However, the amount of pop ups, auto playing new videos, notifications, all of it, is incredibly overwhelming. This could have been a really great app that could help people but instead you choose to harass the user with so many unintuitive menus and new things to scroll away from.

I just wanted to check off that I drank water today, not go on a 5 minute journey in the app.

Please have less clutter and more things that make your app great. For now I will not be continuing my subscription and will be looking elsewhere for a similar product.

title: Great app

I had canceled my subscription and still got charged, and it has been a nightmare trying to get assistance with this issue.

title: Completely changing my outlook!

Fabulous nudges you in the right direction so you don‚Äôt overwhelm yourself. It helps you head on the right path and makes you feel like you are on an adventure of life!

title: Pure fraud

  drinking a full glass of water first thing each morning? Are you serious? I didn‚Äôt use it and thought I had 30 days to cancel.  Waste of time and $$!

title: Wonderful
review: This app is truly amazing...Honestly I‚Äôve only had the app for about 2 weeks now, and I haven‚Äôt even gotten to everything Fabulous has to offer! The app has a very beautiful design and I want to keep using it, but it‚Äôs so frustrating.

title: The best app I‚Äôve ever downloaded

My outlook since downloading it has changed so much, I even look forward to waking up in the morning more. A must have for anyone who struggles with depression, anxiety or organization issues like me.

Valene Archibald.

title: This app ACTUALLY works!!
review: This app is honestly life changing. I struggle deeply with anxiety/depression/ocd/PTSD and it‚Äôs so tough to create healthy routines when carrying all that around. This app has made it so much easier, like my subconscious needs connected with this and it‚Äôs nearly effortless to add positive behaviors now with this kind of support. I‚Äôve never recommended anything more.

The app crashes all the time. It takes multiple tries to mark off rituals and freezes up. Most of the time, it doesn‚Äôt even let me see my rituals. It also doesn‚Äôt track my rituals accurately when they do finally get marked. I love the idea of this app, but there are technical problems that need to be fixed. I accidentally let my free subscription run out and paid for this. Super disappointed that I‚Äôm now stuck with a subscription that doesn‚Äôt work properly.

title: Best app out their for a morning routine
review: Ok so fare it has been a very good app 10/10 it is very calming and I love it if you do not have a routine and want a routine this is for you just stick to what is says and you should be good. Ive been on the app for a week and I have the brain of a smart kid in school that can stick to a morning routine. I love this app my number one goto.

title: The Motivator App
review: I need a stern talking to when it comes to motivation and committing to habits. I‚Äôm usually a great starter and terrible finisher, but Fabulous has changed that. title: Pretty good so far

title: Best mindfulness app I‚Äôve ever used

title: ***please read****

One step at a time, this app guides you to a better life, without rushing you ahead. Great app, this will change your life.

title: I never give reviews..

I found this app and received much, much more. Fabulous has been one of the best motivating factors in my quest for change. I highly recommend it.

title: Great Tool for Setting and Accomplishing Goals

It not only helps you to pause and identify what you are looking to accomplish, it also provides you with the guidance, tools and reminders to make your desires easily attainable.  I am so glad I found it, and I feel absolutely Fabulous!

title: This is a very helpful app.
review: Ever since I got this app it has been very helpful in changing certain habits of mine I highly recommend. But, I have one complaint that I hope the makers of this app will fix. I was reading a motivator letter today and they cussed in it they were talking about a what the heck effect. Well, they didn‚Äôt say ‚Äúheck‚Äù they said the cuss word and I‚Äôm extremely displeased with that.

title: Love!
review: The introduction is what got me hooked! This is not like any other app I have ever used. I feel that I have my very own personal self help coach. There is so much content and daily tips and motivation. I have been working on my morning routine and I get excited to do it and unlock more challenges. Looking forward to what is to come.

title: My opinion about fabulous
review:
I really love it because it never leaves me alone .my days are full of motivation and inspiration since I installed it and use itü•∞

title: Great app
review: I love this app. It has truly kept me reminded of my goals that I can set for myself, it has kept me accountable to do the work each day. As I progress I can add my own goals and work through them all much easier and effectively then I would on my own. I would recommend this app to help get you into healthy habits.

title: So far - pretty good!
review:
Little confusing to navigate - but from what I can tell - it‚Äôs pretty awesome
So far. Just took an extra min to figure out all the functions and directions. But it‚Äôs very good and I have already changed a few morning habits I never thought I would be able to do! So success!!

title: Mental health worker using this on self
review: Nothing better than scientific based help. I‚Äôve been using this to push myself and accomplish things ive been stuck on. Some of us are great coaches but struggle with self motivation- if you‚Äôre like me this app is great and definitely recommend the little extra for annual subscription

title: The developers really cared
review: I don‚Äôt rate apps but I want this one to continue succeeding. It is such high quality from the design to the storytelling to the daily coaching. It really does feel like they believe in us and they‚Äôre doing everything they can to help. I‚Äôm excited about using this for some time.

title: Where did the content go??
review: I recently had to get a new phone after losing my old one and love the fabulous app. However once I redownloaded the app on this newer phone the only tabs on the bottom are home, journey, and discover. This is super duper disappointing since I used the fabulous moments timers to help me do homework and exercise and now they aren‚Äôt there anymore. I wouldn‚Äôt have paid for the year of I had known that :(

title: Keeps me accountable
review: What I like about Fabulous, is the balance between choices. Trying some thing for three days to assess whether it works for me or not, feels like small goals I can keep. This keeps me motivated. The story format is inspirational, and keeps me connected to what‚Äôs important. I like starting and ending my day with Fabulous.

title: Love this app!!!!
review: I love this app so far I‚Äôve only had it for a week but I can already see results there has been an overwhelming amount of great advice good lessons to learn healthy habits to make and it‚Äôs free I love that it‚Äôs free for so many I can‚Äôt afford to purchase these apps yet need them in their life I highly recommend you try this app

title: Very glitchy - I want to like it but can‚Äôt
review: The app seems like a good idea but only works OK. It is very glitchy which is disappointing for something you pay for. The extra tones you‚Äôre supposed to get for premium don‚Äôt exist, the tones that do exist don‚Äôt play for your alarm sound, each task plays a background song that‚Äôs annoying and you have to turn it off every day for each task, if you open another app the timer glitches and pauses or starts over, and more!

title: A journey at my speed
review: Since using this app I‚Äôve felt a huge change in my mind, body, and soul. 2020 has been one for the books. I‚Äôm gently reminded to practice self care and self awareness. I‚Äôm still getting the hang of a few things navigating the app. Overall I am very pleased and excited to have support on my journey.

title: Awesome
review: I don‚Äôt normally write reviews, but this app is awesome. It‚Äôs very motivating and kind while keeping you on track for new habits. Even if you have none in mind, it will guide you. Who knew drinking a glass of water first thing in the morning would be such a game changer for me? I also love getting motivating comments from other users.

title: Great Self-Help Buddy
review: I have been using this app for 5 days now and so far so great. I now look forward to waking up so that I can immediately drink some water, and Unlike before, I now sleep great at night and feels well alive in the morning cus I have been jugging and taking shower at night. This is the best self-help I have come across thus far.

title: Can't wait to see how it develops
review: I wish there was a desktop version and I'd like to see some worksheets on there. I really like the bright colors and artwork. I love the idea of it and am interested in logging on at least once daily. It is motivating to see common personal issues laid out in one place, rather than trying to change habits independently and scouting out your own motivational resources. It's a great roadmap to getting your ducks in a row.

title: Very nice, could use a few minor changes
review: The idea of this app, and the design of it is SO pretty. Very useful, but I wish the activities that you choose to do are guided, and they show us how to do each thing. Another thing-I wish there was more you could do without paying. But I love everything else.

title: Wonderful!
review: This app makes starting new babies so fun and easy! I love the info graphics and the way the journeys are set up to move from simple tasks to more complicated ones. It can be a little overwhelming at first bc it‚Äôs such a comprehensive app, but once you get the hang out it it‚Äôs a fantastic app to help you become more Productive and introduce new habits and goals into your everyday routine.

title: Great motivator, great accountability holder
review: I just got this app, but already I feel supported in a way that makes me feel that I can achieve the goals I have for myself and build and maintain daily habits that will benefit my life. It appears to use some CBT and DBT approaches. So it‚Äôs almost like therapy for me in a way. 10/10 would recommend.

title: Worth every second on the app!
review:
I gave the app a try with the goal to feel more energized, I was given the promise that I only need 15 days to get there and they kept their word.
I‚Äôd say give it a shot and see for your self what good it could bring you!
ps: Words of appreciation to the fabulous team behind the scenes. Mohammed.

title: The help you need!!!
review: I needed a push, to get me started. I always jump to the biggest goal first, however this app has taught me to enjoy the little journeys to greater success. Now the mountain of self discipline doesn‚Äôt look so hard to climb. Just one step at a time. One moment of gratitude after the next!

title: App is really good. However Daily Coaching Audio Clips Go Missing
review: I have been using this app for the last 3 weeks and I really love the Daily Coaching Audio Clips. The 2 to 3 mins audio clips are very insightful and put things in perspective. However these daily coaching clips went missing for the last few days. Contacted the support group. Hopefully they can fix the problem to continue benefiting from this app.

title: Really helpful and enjoyable
review: Has been great so far in providing great tools and environment for me to develop better habits. The interface takes some getting used to, but I love the mood that the app sets with its visuals and music. Tracking is simple and it encourages you to take everything gradually and enjoyably. So far so good!

title: The best wellness app out there
review: I‚Äôve tried a lot of different wellness apps and this is one of the best that I‚Äôve ever seen. It has a lot of different ways to participate and I‚Äôve found it‚Äôs very easy to be involved, consistent, held accountable, and be connected to a community. I can already tell that it‚Äôs making a difference.

title: Brain training
review: Solid science behind this app. It‚Äôs great for retraining your brain towards compassion and positivity. Love how you can tailor your approach. Not intrusive or a drain on my time to do the check-ins. It‚Äôs already made me get up an hour earlier the last two days I‚Äôve used it and feel more motivated and grounded throughout the day.

title: Very disappointed
review: I was excited to try this app but with very little info on how it works and the inability to adjust customize the habits, I cancel within the first 2 days! I filled out their survey on why I was not moving forward with the subscription and yet I was still charged for the premium service. I am waiting for my refund but do feel there is something going on there. Why have me go through a survey on canceling before the 7 days is up if you are still going to charge me?

title: Best habit forming app!
review: I love that this gives you more of a ‚Äúwhy‚Äù behind what you‚Äôre doing. There are a lot of apps that just list what you want to accomplish and you can check it off when you do it, but this app makes it a story and is compelling enough that you want to keep following along

title: Great
review: Great app to build confidence and integrate gradual healthy change into your life. I‚Äôve suggested this to my therapist as something to offer to clients who are depressed and need real change, but the app is  hard to figure out and navigate at first. On the first day I accidentally marked my first task as done before I‚Äôd even done it or knew what it was because there is no instruction in how the app works.

title: Great App
review: VERY helpful app. I have tried to many things and this app actually makes me want to stick with it. Its actually pretty entertaining. I will say that there are a lot of things going on so sometimes i get confused with all of the action items but maybe it is a good thing i will never get bored. Thanks!!

title: Get rid of lists/fantasy self and commit to the app
review: I‚Äôm only on week one but this is fun and very motivating. I have already sent this to all my friends. I recommend doing away with your expectations, list, to do‚Äôs, fantasy self and just focus on this app. Step by step! I realize the change already.

title: Great habit and routine builder
review: I have a hard time building good habits and routines, but this app helps remind me and give me motivation to fix them. The app also encourages including friends or family to join you so you aren‚Äôt doing it alone. I definitely love feeling little accomplishments when I do my tracked habits in the morning.

title: I‚Äôm impressed
review: Honestly awestruck by the sheer amount of helpful tools, tips, and the wide array of goals to choose from to personalize my journey. I thought that maybe it would be too limited unless I paid for premium, like most other self-improvement apps - not so for this one! Really one of a kind. I‚Äôm so happy I have it.

title: Effective!!
review: This app helps you make lifestyle changes at a slow enough pace that you barely even know they are happening! I‚Äôve only been doing this for a week but I already feel a change in my mood and energy levels. Not to mention the whole premise is cute!

title: ...and then the diet talk started
review: I liked the premise of this app the first week (or maybe longer) that I used it. Baby steps into making routines that help you start and end your day, and theoretically get more done, feel better mentally and physically, etc. I initially ignored a few diet-y things (Let‚Äôs talk about intermittent fasting! High protein is the way to go for breakfast!), thinking I could work around them. Alas, that doesn‚Äôt seem to be the case. I‚Äôm going to search around for another app, but will be deleting this one shortly.

title: Truly Fabulous
review: This app has made me look at life differently and positively. You really can do anything & you can transform into a better you. So excited to keep using this app, especially as a college student this helps me focus on myself when things are tough and even when they aren‚Äôt. best thing ever!

title: Fabulous!
review: The name of this App says it all: not only a prediction for your best future, but a very good, empirically grounded format designed to facilitate your journey to that future. Fun, lovely, easy to use, I‚Äôve seen results - feel better, more energized, and confident - after a short relationship with Fabulous! And I‚Äôm looking forward to the rest of the journey.

title: Motivating app
review: I really love this app, it a great start for my day , for all of us out there that need an extra push sometimes , this is the app for that ; it helps you create  a healthy routine while helping you create good mindful habits that will benefit you in your daily life , in simple things like drinking a glass of water every morning!

title: wow

title: Great app!
review: I got the paid version of this app and it is amazing! There are so many choices of journeys and challenges. I‚Äôve been using this app to help make healthier changes in my life and it really helps to keep me accountable. I love how it reminds you throughout the day for what you need to do. title: Beginner
review:
I‚Äôm looking to be more disciplined in my life and I‚Äôve always had a problem with ‚Äúbiting off more than I can chew‚Äù so usually I burn out pretty quick. 
This is helping to regulate my steps and I‚Äôm already seeing those steps build to better habits at day 5.

review: Not much to say. Had this app for like a few days and it‚Äôs very therapeutic. I‚Äôm not talking to a physical person or being and I‚Äôm not really saying things out loud so I can litteraly say anything without being scared of being judged. My notes app does the same thing but this app makes u think

review: It is a great app to help you set up action steps! The only thing that I would suggest is that I need an alarm reminder to do these steps. There are reminder notifications but it would be great if it continued to notify you until you click on it :) it is great app and I enjoy it!

title: Lovely app!
review: With the pandemic this year and a bad motor vehicle accident six months ago, I fell off track in many areas of my life. It felt like my well-being went out the window. I‚Äôm genuinely enjoying using this app to reestablish healthy habits and mindfulness. I‚Äôm taking small but steady steps toward transformation. Thank you for a great product!

title: Great :)
review: This is a great and simple app to use when developing better habits. Some apps are way to complicated and add so many things that becomes overwhelming. This added contents is detrimental when you‚Äôre busy and trying to work on bettering yourself. Simple, kind and smart is better in this case. Thank you!

title: Learning curve
review: It‚Äôs a great app but it‚Äôll take some time getting used too. This app is perfect for those who want to build simple habits then use them as a piggy back for more challenging habits. Also it‚Äôs a bit pricey and the interface could use a touch up, but other than that, it‚Äôs a solid app.

title: Love it.
review:
I love this app so far. I‚Äôve only been using it for 3 days now but I love how the little habits you choose to make everyday can effect so much.

Highly recommend this to anyone who is looking to get back on track with their lives.

title: Amazing!
review: I have only been using the app since the year began. As someone who struggles with consistency it‚Äôs kept me on track and motivated and my journey has just begun!

title: Be fab and focused
review: I‚Äôve been looking for a habit tracker and routine builder to start turning my morning routines and todos into actual actionable and ongoing habits. I think I have found it. review: I‚Äôm only on Day 4 of using Fabulous and enjoying the simple habits it is helping me learn and build. The storyline makes it fun and the info graphics have some great tips. There is an option to set a wake-up bell and the only thing I would change so far is the harsh ding sound. A soft tinkling of bells or harp would be more gentle.

title: Amazing
review: From the look and feel, to the actual purpose, I love this app. In a short time, this app has helped me achieve goals I haven‚Äôt been able to stick with for years! I‚Äôm drinking more water, being more mindful, and looking forward to adding more and more healthy habits each week.

title: AMAMZING!!
review: I absolutely loooove this app!! It‚Äôs helped me so much with gaining my life back, self care, self love and my self esteem. This app has amazing coaching and skills to use in your every day life to promote health and wellness. I‚Äôm gonna cry when I can‚Äôt pay after the trial because I‚Äôm broke rn but u better believe this app is a priority ASAP! Thank you to the inventors, your loved! Lol

title: Love it!!
review:
This app is wonderful for making new habits. I‚Äôve been using it for about a week and it‚Äôs really awesome getting encouraging fabulous moments every morning. 

The reason I didn‚Äôt give it 5 stars is because of the limited amount of things you can do with the free version. It‚Äôs not awful, but a couple more features available would be cool too.

title: Not worth a fee
review: I wanted a habit tracker and this app has potential. It has you choose habits to build morning, evening, and night routines. But the problems are many. It crashes 4 of 5 times I try and log my routines. There are too many extras that crowd out the purpose I got the app. It plays music and tries to get you to have a ‚Äúmoment‚Äù every time you do one of your goals. Thanks app, but I just drank a glass of water in the morning, I don‚Äôt need a two minute celebration of elevator music.

title: Motivational and Easy to Use
review: This app keeps me motivated, functional and on track during times of Covid. It allows me to have some normalcy and routine. I have been enjoying the messages and little challenges. I also like how everything that I‚Äôm interested in is accessible all in one app for my health and wellness.

title: Interesting so far
review:
It does remind me of the things I wanted to develop a better habit if to. The ‚Äústory telling‚Äù aspect is entertaining at times and a bit annoying sometimes but s together it is a very unagressive approach. A bit if a bonnet, that do much is only available in premium version and you‚Äôre always kinda led to the premium version.
Let's see, how it goes...

title: Changed Everythinf
review: Got this app during the start of the COVID-19 crisis and it‚Äôs amazing! It‚Äôs shifted my perspective during this unprecedented time and has helped me build better habits; being more and more conscious of what I‚Äôm putting inside myself (physically, mentally, emotionally and spiritually). Do yourself a favor and try it! You won‚Äôt be disappointed !

title: Overall helpful!
review: Some parts are a little confusing (but I‚Äôve only been using it a couple of days) like how to get from one place to another. But, I imagine that will get easier the more I use it. It is very motivating! I feel like I haven‚Äôt used it enough to truly rate it, but it was asking me too and so I‚Äôm rating it based on a couple days of use.

title: Loving it!
review: Put together so well! I am loving how interactive it is!! I look forward to it daily and I feel like I‚Äôm seeing changes in myself already! I love the journaling aspect as I‚Äôve been wanting to start journaling but nothing felt right until now!! So excited to see where this takes me!

title: Amazing app
review: During the pandemic I developed a lot of bad habits and routines. I wasn‚Äôt at all happy with myself and sort of starting to fall into a depression. After just 5 days using fabulous I‚Äôm already seeing a difference!!! I‚Äôm not even using premium. I highly recommend it. This app is helping me get my life together.

title: Three days in
review:
Loving it so far‚Äîyou start small and it‚Äôs gamified, but the reminders help so much and I love checking it off every day.

Will add another further down the road, as we‚Äôll see whether it continues to apply when other bits of life interfere with habit forming actions (as is wont to happen in my life).

title: Finding a balance with Fabulous
review: The quick truth Fabulous is the only app for my overall wellness I‚Äôve ever stuck with. It‚Äôs easy, the meditation is exactly what I needed, the daily coaching helps me set my intentions and the habit tracking has been a vital tool in me getting both my mental and physical health back on track!

title: Wonderful
review: I‚Äôve been using Fabulous for about a week and I‚Äôm so impressed with the interface and how immersive it is. The reminder to help set you up for success are awesome! It‚Äôs definitely motivated me to make small changes that feel attainable every day, and doesn‚Äôt make me feel crappy if I miss a day.

title: A really amazing tool to finally help me set good habits!
review: I haven‚Äôt been using this app for a week and a half, and I have really loved the structure that it has provided for me on my self-care journey. I would recommend this app anyone who wants to change their life with good habits and improve their productivity, energy and mindset!

title: This app really speaks to my soul
review: I love it. It‚Äôs the only thing that I have found that really walks you through setting goals, and implementing them in small, yet effective ways. I look forward to opening the app and checking off my challenges daily. I‚Äôm just obsessed. Kudos to whoever created this.

title: Really the best app ever
review: With just 3 days using this App I feel a switch in my brain as if I have regained confidence in myself! I used to feel overwhelmed and frustrated because a person like me can have all the tools but need a structure and guidance and this is what fabulous does to me and it makes me feel accomplished.

title: Fabulous has gotten me back into my habits!!
review: Being stuck in quarantine has made me realize all the things I miss out on due to priorities. Yet, fabulous has made room for those extra feel good activities. By helping me practice my habits and giving me activities, in order to fit in my daily priorities:))

title: Great for PTSD
review: I have PTSD and a number of chronic illnesses. I‚Äôve tried other apps in the past and they don‚Äôt compare. This app never makes me feel like I‚Äôm behind or bad about myself in anyway. I‚Äôve been setting new habits and it doesn‚Äôt even feel like work, preserving and increasing my already precious emotional bandwidth.

title: Really Amazing
review: So, I really like this app. I haven‚Äôt used it for very long but I like how it holds you to your tasks but lays it out in a way that‚Äôs easier to manage. The sleek and modern design is fantastic, and I love the art. The creativity of it all is just perfect. Everything I‚Äôve been confused about has been thoroughly explained, and they have a great system of keeping you at work.

title: Best investment I‚Äôve made in years
review: This app is the most effective motivator I‚Äôve found for self-improvement, productivity, and self care. If you struggle with anxiety, this is a huge help with breaking your goals into achievable chunks and guiding you through the process of getting out of your negative cycles. CANNOT recommend enough.

title: Bugs need to be fixed immediately
review: I downloaded the app after getting an ad about it on Pinterest. It seemed really nice until it started acting up. It wouldn‚Äôt allow me to change my alarms or restart my journey. The same notifications kept popping up over and over, and whenever I tried to leave feedback the app crashed. I want to use this app but unless the bugs are fixed I have no choice but to cancel my subscription.

title: New lease on life
review: In one of the hardest times in recent history, finding ways to be apart of something is very difficult. This app makes it easy to be accountable while also setting an easy step by step pace to grow new goals and reach them with some guidance and others with similar goals to help cheer you on along the way! I really enjoy the App.

title: Love the aesthetic
review: I really enjoy the app although I‚Äôve not explored it much yet. I do have to say getting your way around is a bit confusing. Like sometimes I‚Äôm not sure what to do with the app or where to go when I open it. I do like the passages they post and reading through those. The aesthetic is very pleasing and drew me to the app initially. Looking forward to diving deeper in!

title: I am drinking water again in the am
review:
I used to drink a 12 oz bottle of water every morning but stopped and shouldn‚Äôt have at all!
I am happy to say that I am making a practice of it daily.

title: Totally worth it !!
review: This is app so far is definitely worth it I haven‚Äôt even paid for the full year and already it has helped me on rough days, if anyone is looking to help themselves or looking for a change or even just browsing this is great to check out

title: Love this app

This a wonderful way to build new habits.
My struggle with building new habits was that I tried to implement too many new habits all at once that required big change overnight. Therefore, it was not sustainable. This app allows me to make small habits that lead to big habits and major changes in my life.

This app is incredible. I love everything about it but there‚Äôs only one problem: I don‚Äôt get alarms or reminders! Yes, I already activated: Notification sound, alarm sound, sound effects. I also tried removing the app and install it again; none of that worked.

It‚Äôs important to me because the first thing I do in the morning is checking my phone and not being able to see a single notification from this app when I activated all of them makes me very confused and I forget the app even exists. (I tried activating the notifications on settings as well)

title: Wow

title: Good idea poor execution
review:
Not worth the money.

I really wish I could enjoy the app, since a refund for my accidental subscription is impossible. 

I can see why some people find it helpful. Good content, guided ways to for habit and nice UI. However after two months, the long-wonder cartoon, messy structure, peculiarly limited options (yes the conflict between journey and challenge) really get under your skin. 

There‚Äôs also the commonly criticized issues like crashing and blanks. We have to rely on screenshots shared by other kind users in the same challenge to keep up. 

All the service I received in a whole week is ‚Äútry reload for the sixth time‚Äù. Unbelievable. And they don‚Äôt care if you want to ask questions or seek support, just replace the support team with a Notion page.

First one star review ever. It is that bad.

From the storytelling, to the steps I feel I take when scrolling the screen‚Äîthis app makes creating habits EASY. It feels judge-free, carefully/scientifically put together, and truly encapsulates the idea of a journey.

title: Really helpful way to ease into healthy habits.

review: I tend to struggle with following through with goals and a consistent daily routine. This app is so helpful for me! I look forward to checking off things that I struggle with doing daily such as drinking water, eating breakfast, etc. I am only on the first part of the journey but I am sooo excited to see what is ahead!

title: ‚ÄúPremium‚Äù is a lie
review:
I paid $35 (annually) for the premium version, only to discover it doesn‚Äôt unlock all the features. If I wanted ALL the features, it would cost me an additional $250.

There are free apps that do much the same as this without the bells and whistles.  You can also create a spreadsheet with the tasks you want to turn into habits.  Start with one or two and check them off each time you do one.  It takes 30 to 60 days to create a habit.  Add new habits as you master old ones. Good luck.

title: AMAZING

title: Great app
review:

title: Train Yourself

title: So far so good.

review:

I felt a lot of pressure to sign up for too many actions after a ‚Äúhoneymoon period‚Äù of simple, mindfully encouraging self exploration contemplations.

title: Truly a great app.

The free version is great, but I‚Äôve been considering paying for it yearly. The daily pledge to no alcohol is my favorite, it has kept me from relapsing a few times.

But it would be amazing if it didn‚Äôt make me basically restart after I get too busy with life. It makes me want to stop using it entirely and that is unfortunate.

title: It‚Äôs absolutely Fabulous!

review: I have been able to keep routines. Also I love that things like mediation and being grateful are habits that are recommended because those are things we don‚Äôt necessarily think about when trying to get routine together. It‚Äôs time management and self care in one app.

title: Great app!
review: Love this app and how it is helping me get back on track with a healthy routine since the COVID crisis and staying at home. I call it my Pocket Buddy. title: Not what I expected, but I love it!

review: I downloaded it a few days ago and the smallest changes have done wonders for my mental health. Like a few days ago was the most fulfilling day I‚Äôve had in 6 YEARS and all the positive emotions drove me to tears you guys and this app are lifesavers ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è

title: Helped me so much

title: Love
review: It starts out slow and it makes you feel like Meh this is going to be nothing. However it really teaches you consistency and follow through without being overloaded with tasks and allows you to see how your commitment is going. Doesn‚Äôt set you up to fail. Love it

Seriously

title: love it

I mostly like the app a lot. The only thing I didn't like is one of the promotional letters they use to sell the premium upgrade. 

The letter basically said (paraphrase) "if you don't buy the upgrade, your life will be trash in 10 years so you may as well just end it all today"

I think that's a dangerous marketing ploy for someone seeking this type of support. When I read it, I uninstalled the app for almost 2 months. I came back cuz I liked other features but I make sure to ignore those letters. I hope they removed it but it really upset me. 

Since I've been back, I like it a lot and have no complaints.

title: Amazing, user friendly app for self care
review: I love this app so much. You can set up routine schedules very easily but you can also get lost exploring the app for hours with all the content they have. It‚Äôs organized in a way that isn‚Äôt overwhelming, I recommend this app to anyone who thrives with routine!

title: Fabulous
review: This app is very inspiring and easy to use. It practically walks you through everything. It allows you to set personal goals and track when you have completed them too!
